response.original_title: Just The Facts: Little Known Facts of American History
response.overview: You may know about the major events during America s history, but the little known happenings are equally fascinating and possibly just as important. Little Known Facts looks at the uncommon tales of America s lesser-known explorers and pioneers. Jedidiah Smith, Adolphus Greely, John Colter, John Muir, Hiram Bingham, Henry Dreyfuss, Nikolai Tesla and many others may not have famous names, but they paved paths of innovation in exploration and science which has left a substantial impact on the growth and success of America. These stories are timeless and will be enjoyed by all ages.
response.title: Just The Facts: Little Known Facts of American History
